Rewards Rate: 5 RP for every ₹100 spent on domestic purchases; 10 RP for every ₹100 spent on international transactions
Reward Redemption: Eaned RP is redeemable at rblrewards website
Golf: 4 free rounds of golf each year and one golf lesson every month.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% waiver on fuel transactions between ₹400 to ₹5,000.

product_details: 24/7 concierge services are provided to cardholders.
Golf privileges are included with this card.
A 1% fuel surcharge waiver of up to ₹250 every month on fuel transactions.
Milestone benefits are also provided with this card.
